actions.label: Manipulating text and logo brightness
actions.details: The 'GoPro' logo and the 'Be a HERO.' tagline text brighten and dim on a black background.

actions.label: Manipulating text and logo visibility
actions.details: The 'GoMechanic' logo (car icon and text), 'STANDARD SERVICE' text, and 'POINT OF VIEW' text appear and brighten on a black background.

actions.label: manipulating object
actions.details: Right hand, wearing a black glove, interacts with the car door handle.

actions.label: Left hand pointing
actions.details: A person's left hand, wearing a black glove, is pointing upwards and slightly to the right towards the 'GoMechanic SELECT' sign.

actions.label: Right hand manipulating steering wheel
actions.details: A person's right hand, wearing a black glove, is holding the steering wheel of the car.

actions.label: pointing
actions.details: A person's gloved hands are pointing towards a silver car.

actions.label: pointing at car
actions.details: The person is pointing at the silver car with both hands, which are covered in black gloves.

actions.label: touching car hood
actions.details: The person places both gloved hands on the hood of the silver car.

actions.label: Dipstick manipulation
actions.details: The person manipulates the yellow dipstick using a blue cloth.  Actions include pulling, wiping, inserting, and pushing the dipstick into the engine.
